description:
Saneatsu Narita finds himself in a game of survival as half of the human population disappears each night!

The game began suddenly. It was "Tasuketsu", a brutal survival game in which the majority is eliminated. In order to fight back against the immensely powerful emperor masterminding the game, young men and women create their own futures using the mysterious special ability known as "Special Right."

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

title.native: 多数欠 -Judgement Assizes- THE ORIGINAL ANIMATION

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1125774975636361219)

Started off as a production manager.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).
_Note: Not to be confused with the [CG artist](https://anilist.co/staff/156551/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1125774975636361219)

Started off as a production manager.

[Website](https://vivarush.jp/) | [Twitter](https://x.com/vivar_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/vivar_official/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@vivarush_official)
VIVARUSH is a Japenese visual kei band. Members: [Ruimaru (るいまる)](https://anilist.co/staff/340302) - vocals Yukimura (幸村) - guitar Touya (冬也) - bass [Pamy (パーミー)](https://anilist.co/staff/340303/Pamy) - drums

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/vr_ruimaru/?hl=ja) | [Twitter](https://x.com/vr_ruimaru)
Ruimaru is a Japanese singer-songwriter. He is currently the vocalist of the visual kei band [VIVARUSH](https://anilist.co/staff/340300/VIVARUSH).

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/vr_pamypamy/?hl=ja) | [Twitter](https://x.com/vr_pamypamy)
Pamy is a Japanese musician. He is currently the drummer of the visual kei band [VIVARUSH](https://anilist.co/staff/340300).

[Website](https://vivarush.jp/) | [Twitter](https://x.com/vivar_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/vivar_official/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@vivarush_official)
VIVARUSH is a Japenese visual kei band. Members: [Ruimaru (るいまる)](https://anilist.co/staff/340302) - vocals Yukimura (幸村) - guitar Touya (冬也) - bass [Pamy (パーミー)](https://anilist.co/staff/340303/Pamy) - drums

[Website](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/aiba/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aibaaiai) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aiba_aiai/)

A voice actor and the lead singer of the band [Roselia](https://anilist.co/staff/153170/Roselia). Before becoming a seiyuu, she was a professional wrestler under the name "Yuuki Harima" for about 2 years, and also worked as a stage actress.

Aina is energetic, jokes around a lot, and often has a hard time staying in-character. One of her hobbies is looking after race horses. She also loves singing karaoke; one of her favorite songs to sing is "only my railgun."
